Cloud Deployments.Notes: SAP HANA scale-out is not supported./n To use Quarantine without relocatable/virtual IP, the HANA data access network must be configured as a hdb_replication_subnet in the package configuration. This prevents simultaneous usage of a cross-subnet configuration. /n Easy deployment of Microsoft SQL Server workloads in not supported.
Cloud Deployments.Notes2: Cluster with Cloud Instances as nodes should be from within a Region of a cloud./n Nodes of a cluster when deployed in cloud should be from a single cloud vendor and cannot be mixed with instances from other cloud vendors or those that are situated on premise. /n Layer 4 Load Balancer provided by the cloud vendor is used to support Relocatable IP or Virtual IP in a Serviceguard package for clients to connect with the applications protected by Serviceguard. /n Supported only with Non-shared storage: /n Applications with in-built data replications - SAP HANA scale-up with HANA System Replication, Oracle with Oracle Data Guard, Microsoft SQL Server Always On Availability groups, Applications using Serviceguard for Linux Flex Storage Add-on that provides HPE Software based storage replication solution using DRBD for non-shared storages
